attributes.action: protection   and safegurds for bank customer.s
attributes.additional_details:
the  banking public needs
real rights as consumers
as they charge for a service and dont  do it
tell lies  and waiting 6 days for the bank to do as requested  and they  dont seem to care less
but give excuses

and gets charged for a service of for which they have not done for the last 6 days

they must be governed  better

but is not   doing a service
